introduction.content: After several years working in my family company in the facilities business, I have decided to change career and jump deeply in the software development field, I could get a Degree in Analysis and Software Development and after that, I have tried to learn more and more about the latest technologies we can use for these days.

I could learn a lot during my journey as a CFO at Dubhay, I have developed skills in management and was a big school for me, basically, I have stayed since the beginner and put my hands and my heart to help the company be a success, But Software development is my passion and in 2017 I decided to move to Europe to learn English and improve my communication skills.

In August of 2018 I have joined to a Codaisseur Code Academy in Amsterdam, I was attended for 10 hard fulltime weeks of totally coding, when I could learn all important aspects about how to be a strong independent developer, many technologies were reached me at this time and now I can say that I confident in almost those technologies and I am excited to start to apply at real world.
